alert.note: Alert for Attala; Carroll; Holmes; Leflore; Montgomery (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 25 at 10:16PM CDT until June 25 at 11:45PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Holmes County in central Mississippi... Southern Carroll County in north central Mississippi... Southeastern Leflore County in north central Mississippi... Attala County in central Mississippi... South central Montgomery County in north central Mississippi... * Until 1145 PM CDT. * At 1015 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Cruger to near Eden, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Tolarville around 1020 PM CDT. Coxburg and Seven Pines around 1025 PM CDT. Brozville around 1030 PM CDT. Ebenezer and Black Hawk around 1035 PM CDT. Franklin around 1040 PM CDT. Pickens and Emory around 1045 PM CDT. Goodman and Bowling Green around 1050 PM CDT. West around 1100 PM CDT. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
